short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Appends '&num=100' to the current Google search URL and reloads the page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google Search 100 Results is a simple Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing experience on Google Search. With just a single click, this extension appends the parameter &num=100 to the current Google search URL, ensuring that you see 100 search results on a single page. 
This extension is perfect for users who prefer to see more results at once, whether you're conducting research, shopping, or simply browsing the web. Easy to use, lightweight, and effective, "Google Search 100 Results" streamlines your search process, allowing for quicker access to the information you need.
